page.title: 02DOOMSDAY PROJECT
page.content: My group was given square number 6.We were given a map and we had to find the ammount of farmland, woodland, roadways, buildings and water.Then we had to telephone the farmers in our square.This is my telephone conversation "Good afternoon,my name is Steven Trevor from Nether Alderley School.We are doing the 1985 Domesday Survey of this area so please could I ask you some questions ? Would you like me to ask you now,telephone back later or could we come round to see you ?"The questions were:What acreage do you have ? How many fields have you ? What animals do you keep ? What crops do you grow ? " Goodbye and thank you for spending time with me" All the farmers were very helpful indeed.
